name: ActionComponent

inputsClass.name: icon
inputsClass.rawdescription: The icon to show on this action
inputsClass.description: The icon to show on this action

inputsClass.name: priority
inputsClass.rawdescription: The priority of this action (the higher the number, the higher the action will be displayed; optional)
inputsClass.description: The priority of this action (the higher the number, the higher the action will be displayed; optional)

methodsClass.name: ngAfterViewInit
methodsClass.rawdescription: After page view is initialized, component adds itself to global action list.
methodsClass.description: After page view is initialized, component adds itself to global action list.

methodsClass.name: ngOnDestroy
methodsClass.rawdescription: Action is removed from global action list, if component is not used anymore.
methodsClass.description: Action is removed from global action list, if component is not used anymore.

description:
A can be added with content projection.

Example :
<c8y-action>
  <button class="btn" (click)="myAction()">My action</button>
</c8y-action>
rawdescription:
A <c8y-action> can be added with content projection.

```html
<c8y-action>
  <button class="btn" (click)="myAction()">My action</button>
</c8y-action>
```
